DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cohort study provide information : characteristic Rivaroxaban use patient prescribe Rivaroxaban first time compare patient prescribe Warfarin first time , occurrence intracranial haemorrhage , gastrointestinal urogenital bleeding , occurrence non-infective liver disease .
